info.title: Xentral Business Documents API v3
info.description:
**This is a preliminary version of the Xentral Business Documents API v3.** 

It is not yet complete, specifications may change without prior notice. Please use it with caution and report any issues you find

documentNumber.description: Document number. For drafts, this will be null.

writeProtection.description: Indicates if the document is write protected

address.description: Address entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Address object, use the `include` parameter.

project.description: Project entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Project object, use the `include` parameter.

tags.description: Tags assigned to the document. This property is only returned if the `tags` include is used.

name.description: Name of the tag

documentAddress.description: The recipients postal address of the document. This is is usually the postal address of the document's address entitiy, (e.g. customer), or is populated based on the preceding document. As this address is persisted on the document level, it can however be modified independently, and does not reflect changes that occurred since the document was created.

name.description:
Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

internalDesignation.description: Internal designation, might be displayed in the letterhead

bodyIntroduction.description: Text displayed on the document before the line items
bodyIntroduction.example: Dear customer, we are pleased to send you the following invoice.

bodyOutroduction.description: Text displayed on the document after the line items

internalComment.description: Internal comment, does not show up on the document. Intended to be used for company-internal notes.

id.description: ID of the user who is responsible for the document

name.description: Name of the user who is responsible for the document

sales.description: Sales person responsible for the document

currentlyEditedBy.description: ID of the user who is currently editing the document. Null if not currently edited. This corresponds to the red label in the Xentral UI that is displayed when a document is currently being edited by another user.

activity.description: Activity log entries associated with the document

taxation.description: Taxation of the document, e.g. "domestic" or "eu".

currency.description: Currency of the document, e.g. "EUR" or "USD".

documentDate.description: Date of the document. Current date is used when omitted.

tags.description: List of tags associated with the document. New tags will be automatically created if they do not exist.

name.description: Name of the Tag

documentAddress.description: Represents a postal address with contact information.

effectiveAddresses.description:
Effective addresses of the delivery note. These (read-only) postal addresses will always be set, regardless
            of whether a deviating ship-to address is set or not. Use these fields if you need to easily determine the ship-to and bill-to addresses of the delivery note. For updating, use the `documentAddress` and `deviatingShipToAddress` fields.

deviatingShipToAddress.description: The deviating ship-to postal address of the offer, if set. Null otherwise - which leads to the document address becoming the ship-to address.

customerReference.description: Customer reference for the offer. This is a reference provided by the customer, e.g., a request or inquiry number.

desiredDeliveryDate.description: Desired delivery date of the offer. This is the date when the customer wants to receive the goods.

desiredDeliveryDateAsCalendarWeek.description: Indicates if the desired delivery date is expressed as a calendar week. If true, the `desiredDeliveryDate` should be interpreted as the start of the calendar week.

validUntilDate.description: Validity date of the offer. After this date, the offer is considered expired.

plannedOrderDate.description: Planned order date for the offer. This is the date when the order is planned to be created from the offer.

useAlternativeDocumentTitle.description: Indicates if the alternative document title should be used. The alternative document title can be configured per document type in the system settings.

manualShippingCostApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the shipping costs of the offer. Depending on the shipping method configuration, this might be required before the offer can be dispatched.

hideTotalAmount.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the total amount

documentAddress.description: The recipients postal address of the document. Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

internalDesignation.description: Internal designation, might be displayed in the letterhead

bodyIntroduction.description: Text displayed on the document before the line items
bodyIntroduction.example: Dear customer, we are pleased to send you the following invoice.

bodyOutroduction.description: Text displayed on the document after the line items

internalComment.description: Internal comment, does not show up on the document. Intended to be used for company-internal notes.

id.description: ID of the user who is responsible for the document

name.description: Name of the user who is responsible for the document

sales.description: Sales person responsible for the document

currentlyEditedBy.description: ID of the user who is currently editing the document. Null if not currently edited. This corresponds to the red label in the Xentral UI that is displayed when a document is currently being edited by another user.

activity.description: Activity log entries associated with the document

financials.description: Financials properties of the document

paymentMethod.description: Payment method of the document. This is a reference to the payment method used for the document.

taxation.description: Taxation of the document, e.g. "domestic" or "eu".

disableTaxNotice.description: Indicates if the tax notice should be disabled for this document.

taxRates.description: Tax rates of the document. These values cannot be edited directly via the Xentral UI, and are set based on the tax settings and the delivery or billing region.

totals.description: Totals of the document. These values cannot be set directly, but are calculated based on the line items

oneOf.description: Represents a postal address with contact information.

name.description:
Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

deviatingShipToAddress.description: The deviating ship-to postal address of the sales order, if set. Null otherwise - which leads to the document address becoming the ship-to address.

isSalesOrderToSupplier.description: Indicates if this sales order is a sales order to a supplier.

externalOrderNumber.description: External order number of the sales order, e.g. from a webshop

customerOrderNumber.description: Customer order number of the sales order, e.g. the customer's order number

transactionNumber.description: Transaction number of the sales order, e.g. for payment processing. Please not that this value can currently not be edited via the Xentral UI.

externalOrderId.description: External order ID of the sales order, e.g. from a webshop or external system. This is not the same as the external order number. The external order ID is often used for integration purposes, and is typically a technical identifier from a upstream system.

desiredDeliveryDate.description: Desired delivery date of the sales order. This is the date when the customer expects the order to be delivered.

desiredDeliveryDateAsCalendarWeek.description: Indicates if the desired delivery date is expressed as a calendar week. If true, the `desiredDeliveryDate` should be interpreted as the start of the calendar week.

earliestFulfillmentDate.description: Earliest fulfillment date of the sales order. This is the date when the order can be fulfilled at the earliest.

reservationDate.description: Reservation date of the sales order. Before this date (if set), the order is not considered for stock reservations.

preferredWarehouse.description: Preferred warehouse for the sales order. If set, only stock from this warehouse is considered for stock reservations, and the sales order cannot be dispatched if the selected warehouse does not have sufficient stock.

withoutLetterhead.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the letterhead

withoutProductText.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the product text

commissionConsignmentWarehouse.description: Commission/consignment warehouse for the sales order. This is used by the commission/consignment module.

storageCountry.description: Storage country of the sales order. This is used for tax calculations and compliance. Please note that the value of this field cannot be edited or viewed in the Xentral UI

useAlternativeDocumentTitle.description: Indicates if the alternative document title should be used. The alternative document title can be configured per document type in the system settings.

autoDispatch.description: Indicates if the sales order is available for auto dispatch.

exportCheck.description: Indicates if the sales order has passed the export check. This is used for compliance with export regulations. If this is false, the sales order cannot be dispatched.

createDocuments.description: Indicates the type of documents that will be created if this sales order is processed using auto dispatch.

manualPaymentApproval.description: Use this field to manual approve the payment of the sales order. Depending on the payment method configuration, this might be required before the sales order can be dispatched.

manualShippingCostApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the shipping costs of the sales order. Depending on the shipping method configuration, this might be required before the sales order can be dispatched.

manualDeliveryBlockApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the delivery block of the sales order. If this is true, the sales order can be dispatched despite having a delivery block.

fastLane.description: Indicates if the sales order is a fast lane order. Fast lane orders are processed with higher priority during auto dispatch, and stock is allocated preferentially to them.

disableCancellationEmail.description: Indicates if the cancellation email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no cancellation email will be sent when the sales order is cancelled. Please note that the cancellation email has to be enabled in the project settings for this to take effect.

disableTrackingEmail.description: Indicates if the tracking email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no tracking email will be sent when the sales order is dispatched. Please note that the tracking email has to be enabled in the project and shipping method settings for this to take effect.

disablePaymentEmail.description: Indicates if the payment email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no payment email will be sent when the sales order is paid. Please note that the payment email has to be enabled in the project and payment method  settings for this to take effect.

get.description:
This endpoint is only available if the feature flag `api-v3-delivery-notes` is enabled.

This endpoint requires the following scopes: `deliveryNote:read`.

Paginated list of Delivery Notes

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort via id, -id, documentNumber, -documentNumber, documentDate, -documentDate, status, -status, createdAt, -createdAt, updatedAt and -updatedAt. Default sort is -created_at

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default: 15, Max: 100

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The filter parameter is used to filter the results of the given endpoint. 


**Supported filter operators by key:** 

`id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`documentNumber`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`documentDate`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *lessThan*, *lessThanOrEquals*, *greaterThan*, *greaterThanOrEquals* 

`writeProtection`: *equals*, *notEquals* 

`address.id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`project.id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`tags`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`language`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`texts.bodyIntroduction`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`texts.bodyOutroduction`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`project.abbreviation`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`internalDesignation`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`vatId`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`costCenter`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`deliveryTerms`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`internalComment`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith*

`editor.id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*

documentNumber.description: Document number. For drafts, this will be null.

writeProtection.description: Indicates if the document is write protected

address.description: Address entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Address object, use the `include` parameter.

project.description: Project entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Project object, use the `include` parameter.

tags.description: Tags assigned to the document. This property is only returned if the `tags` include is used.

name.description: Name of the tag

documentAddress.description: The recipients postal address of the document. This is is usually the postal address of the document's address entitiy, (e.g. customer), or is populated based on the preceding document. As this address is persisted on the document level, it can however be modified independently, and does not reflect changes that occurred since the document was created.

name.description:
Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

internalDesignation.description: Internal designation, might be displayed in the letterhead

bodyIntroduction.description: Text displayed on the document before the line items
bodyIntroduction.example: Dear customer, we are pleased to send you the following invoice.

bodyOutroduction.description: Text displayed on the document after the line items

internalComment.description: Internal comment, does not show up on the document. Intended to be used for company-internal notes.

id.description: ID of the user who is responsible for the document

name.description: Name of the user who is responsible for the document

sales.description: Sales person responsible for the document

currentlyEditedBy.description: ID of the user who is currently editing the document. Null if not currently edited. This corresponds to the red label in the Xentral UI that is displayed when a document is currently being edited by another user.

activity.description: Activity log entries associated with the document

financials.description: Financials properties of the document

paymentMethod.description: Payment method of the document. This is a reference to the payment method used for the document.

taxation.description: Taxation of the document, e.g. "domestic" or "eu".

disableTaxNotice.description: Indicates if the tax notice should be disabled for this document.

taxRates.description: Tax rates of the document. These values cannot be edited directly via the Xentral UI, and are set based on the tax settings and the delivery or billing region.

totals.description: Totals of the document. These values cannot be set directly, but are calculated based on the line items

Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

deviatingShipToAddress.description: The deviating ship-to postal address of the offer, if set. Null otherwise - which leads to the document address becoming the ship-to address.

customerReference.description: Customer reference for the offer. This is a reference provided by the customer, e.g., a request or inquiry number.

desiredDeliveryDate.description: Desired delivery date of the offer. This is the date when the customer wants to receive the goods.

desiredDeliveryDateAsCalendarWeek.description: Indicates if the desired delivery date is expressed as a calendar week. If true, the `desiredDeliveryDate` should be interpreted as the start of the calendar week.

validUntilDate.description: Validity date of the offer. After this date, the offer is considered expired.

plannedOrderDate.description: Planned order date for the offer. This is the date when the order is planned to be created from the offer.

useAlternativeDocumentTitle.description: Indicates if the alternative document title should be used. The alternative document title can be configured per document type in the system settings.

manualShippingCostApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the shipping costs of the offer. Depending on the shipping method configuration, this might be required before the offer can be dispatched.

withoutProductText.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the product text

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort via id, -id, documentNumber, -documentNumber, documentDate, -documentDate, status, -status, createdAt, -createdAt, updatedAt and -updatedAt. Default sort is -created_at

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default: 15, Max: 100

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

documentNumber.description: Document number. For drafts, this will be null.

writeProtection.description: Indicates if the document is write protected

address.description: Address entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Address object, use the `include` parameter.

project.description: Project entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Project object, use the `include` parameter.

tags.description: Tags assigned to the document. This property is only returned if the `tags` include is used.

name.description: Name of the tag

documentAddress.description: The recipients postal address of the document. This is is usually the postal address of the document's address entitiy, (e.g. customer), or is populated based on the preceding document. As this address is persisted on the document level, it can however be modified independently, and does not reflect changes that occurred since the document was created.

name.description:
Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

internalDesignation.description: Internal designation, might be displayed in the letterhead

bodyIntroduction.description: Text displayed on the document before the line items
bodyIntroduction.example: Dear customer, we are pleased to send you the following invoice.

bodyOutroduction.description: Text displayed on the document after the line items

internalComment.description: Internal comment, does not show up on the document. Intended to be used for company-internal notes.

id.description: ID of the user who is responsible for the document

name.description: Name of the user who is responsible for the document

sales.description: Sales person responsible for the document

currentlyEditedBy.description: ID of the user who is currently editing the document. Null if not currently edited. This corresponds to the red label in the Xentral UI that is displayed when a document is currently being edited by another user.

activity.description: Activity log entries associated with the document

financials.description: Financials properties of the document

paymentMethod.description: Payment method of the document. This is a reference to the payment method used for the document.

taxation.description: Taxation of the document, e.g. "domestic" or "eu".

disableTaxNotice.description: Indicates if the tax notice should be disabled for this document.

taxRates.description: Tax rates of the document. These values cannot be edited directly via the Xentral UI, and are set based on the tax settings and the delivery or billing region.

totals.description: Totals of the document. These values cannot be set directly, but are calculated based on the line items

oneOf.description: Represents a postal address with contact information.

name.description:
Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

deviatingShipToAddress.description: The deviating ship-to postal address of the sales order, if set. Null otherwise - which leads to the document address becoming the ship-to address.

isSalesOrderToSupplier.description: Indicates if this sales order is a sales order to a supplier.

externalOrderNumber.description: External order number of the sales order, e.g. from a webshop

customerOrderNumber.description: Customer order number of the sales order, e.g. the customer's order number

transactionNumber.description: Transaction number of the sales order, e.g. for payment processing. Please not that this value can currently not be edited via the Xentral UI.

externalOrderId.description: External order ID of the sales order, e.g. from a webshop or external system. This is not the same as the external order number. The external order ID is often used for integration purposes, and is typically a technical identifier from a upstream system.

desiredDeliveryDate.description: Desired delivery date of the sales order. This is the date when the customer expects the order to be delivered.

desiredDeliveryDateAsCalendarWeek.description: Indicates if the desired delivery date is expressed as a calendar week. If true, the `desiredDeliveryDate` should be interpreted as the start of the calendar week.

earliestFulfillmentDate.description: Earliest fulfillment date of the sales order. This is the date when the order can be fulfilled at the earliest.

reservationDate.description: Reservation date of the sales order. Before this date (if set), the order is not considered for stock reservations.

preferredWarehouse.description: Preferred warehouse for the sales order. If set, only stock from this warehouse is considered for stock reservations, and the sales order cannot be dispatched if the selected warehouse does not have sufficient stock.

withoutLetterhead.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the letterhead

withoutProductText.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the product text

commissionConsignmentWarehouse.description: Commission/consignment warehouse for the sales order. This is used by the commission/consignment module.

storageCountry.description: Storage country of the sales order. This is used for tax calculations and compliance. Please note that the value of this field cannot be edited or viewed in the Xentral UI

useAlternativeDocumentTitle.description: Indicates if the alternative document title should be used. The alternative document title can be configured per document type in the system settings.

autoDispatch.description: Indicates if the sales order is available for auto dispatch.

exportCheck.description: Indicates if the sales order has passed the export check. This is used for compliance with export regulations. If this is false, the sales order cannot be dispatched.

createDocuments.description: Indicates the type of documents that will be created if this sales order is processed using auto dispatch.

manualPaymentApproval.description: Use this field to manual approve the payment of the sales order. Depending on the payment method configuration, this might be required before the sales order can be dispatched.

manualShippingCostApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the shipping costs of the sales order. Depending on the shipping method configuration, this might be required before the sales order can be dispatched.

manualDeliveryBlockApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the delivery block of the sales order. If this is true, the sales order can be dispatched despite having a delivery block.

fastLane.description: Indicates if the sales order is a fast lane order. Fast lane orders are processed with higher priority during auto dispatch, and stock is allocated preferentially to them.

disableCancellationEmail.description: Indicates if the cancellation email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no cancellation email will be sent when the sales order is cancelled. Please note that the cancellation email has to be enabled in the project settings for this to take effect.

disableTrackingEmail.description: Indicates if the tracking email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no tracking email will be sent when the sales order is dispatched. Please note that the tracking email has to be enabled in the project and shipping method settings for this to take effect.

disablePaymentEmail.description: Indicates if the payment email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no payment email will be sent when the sales order is paid. Please note that the payment email has to be enabled in the project and payment method  settings for this to take effect.

packagingUnit.description: The unit of packaging for the line item

effectiveAddresses.description:
Effective addresses of the sales order. These (read-only) postal addresses will always be set, regardless

preferredWarehouse.description: Preferred warehouse for the sales order. If set, only stock from this warehouse is considered for stock reservations, and the sales order cannot be dispatched if the selected warehouse does not have sufficient stock.

withoutLetterhead.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the letterhead

withoutProductText.description: For PDFs or physical documents, hide the product text

commissionConsignmentWarehouse.description: Commission/consignment warehouse for the sales order. This is used by the commission/consignment module.

storageCountry.description: Storage country of the sales order. This is used for tax calculations and compliance. Please note that the value of this field cannot be edited or viewed in the Xentral UI

useAlternativeDocumentTitle.description: Indicates if the alternative document title should be used. The alternative document title can be configured per document type in the system settings.

autoDispatch.description: Indicates if the sales order is available for auto dispatch.

exportCheck.description: Indicates if the sales order has passed the export check. This is used for compliance with export regulations. If this is false, the sales order cannot be dispatched.

createDocuments.description: Indicates the type of documents that will be created if this sales order is processed using auto dispatch.

manualPaymentApproval.description: Use this field to manual approve the payment of the sales order. Depending on the payment method configuration, this might be required before the sales order can be dispatched.

manualShippingCostApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the shipping costs of the sales order. Depending on the shipping method configuration, this might be required before the sales order can be dispatched.

manualDeliveryBlockApproval.description: Use this field to manually approve the delivery block of the sales order. If this is true, the sales order can be dispatched despite having a delivery block.

fastLane.description: Indicates if the sales order is a fast lane order. Fast lane orders are processed with higher priority during auto dispatch, and stock is allocated preferentially to them.

disableCancellationEmail.description: Indicates if the cancellation email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no cancellation email will be sent when the sales order is cancelled. Please note that the cancellation email has to be enabled in the project settings for this to take effect.

disableTrackingEmail.description: Indicates if the tracking email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no tracking email will be sent when the sales order is dispatched. Please note that the tracking email has to be enabled in the project and shipping method settings for this to take effect.

disablePaymentEmail.description: Indicates if the payment email should be disabled for this sales order. If true, no payment email will be sent when the sales order is paid. Please note that the payment email has to be enabled in the project and payment method  settings for this to take effect.

View a single sales order

documentNumber.description: Document number. For drafts, this will be null.

writeProtection.description: Indicates if the document is write protected

address.description: Address entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Address object, use the `include` parameter.

project.description: Project entity of the document. By default, only the ID is returned. To get the full Project object, use the `include` parameter.

tags.description: Tags assigned to the document. This property is only returned if the `tags` include is used.

name.description: Name of the tag

documentAddress.description: The recipients postal address of the document. This is is usually the postal address of the document's address entitiy, (e.g. customer), or is populated based on the preceding document. As this address is persisted on the document level, it can however be modified independently, and does not reflect changes that occurred since the document was created.

name.description:
Represents an address consisting of a physical address and contact information.
It is used in various documents, such as invoices, delivery notes, etc.

internalDesignation.description: Internal designation, might be displayed in the letterhead

bodyIntroduction.description: Text displayed on the document before the line items
bodyIntroduction.example: Dear customer, we are pleased to send you the following invoice.

bodyOutroduction.description: Text displayed on the document after the line items

internalComment.description: Internal comment, does not show up on the document. Intended to be used for company-internal notes.

sales.description: Sales person responsible for the document

financials.description: Financials properties of the document

paymentMethod.description: Payment method of the document. This is a reference to the payment method used for the document.

disableTaxNotice.description: Indicates if the tax notice should be disabled for this document.

taxRates.description: Tax rates of the document. These values cannot be edited directly via the Xentral UI, and are set based on the tax settings and the delivery or billing region.

totals.description: Totals of the document. These values cannot be set directly, but are calculated based on the line items

name.description: The name of the line item. Usually the product name, but can be adjusted if required.

description.description: The description of the line item. Usually the product description, but can be adjusted if required.
description.example: Delicious strawberry jam made from fresh strawberries.

quantity.description: The quantity of the line item

product.description: The product of the line item

financials.description: Financial information of the line item

effectiveTaxRate.description: The effective tax rate for this line item

hasChildLineItems.description: Indicates if this line item has child line items (exploded line items)

parentLineItem.description: If this line item is a child line item, this will contain the parent line item ID

unit.description: The unit of the line item

deliveryDate.description: The delivery date of the line item

deliveryDateAsCalendarWeek.description: Whether to show the delivery date as calendar week or explicit

packagingUnit.description: The unit of packaging for the line item

order.description: The ordering sequence of the line item

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the line item was last updated

createdAt.description: The date and time when the line item was created

taxRate.description: Tax rate type applied to this line item

effectiveTaxRate.description: Effective tax rate for this line item

price.description: Price information for this line item

discount.description: Discount percentage applied to this line item

itemRevenue.description: Total revenue for all quantities of this line item

lineItemRevenue.description: Revenue for a single unit of this line item

product: The product field must be an array.
number: The number field must be a string.
name: The name field must be a string.

get.description:
This endpoint is only available if the feature flag `core-api-v3` is enabled.

This endpoint requires the following scopes: `salesPrice:read`.

Paginated list of SalesPrices

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The filter parameter is used to filter the results of the given endpoint. 


**Supported filter operators by key:** 

`id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`product.id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`customer.id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`group.id`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn* 

`currency`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *contains*, *notContains*, *startsWith*, *endsWith* 

`amount`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *in*, *notIn*, *greaterThan*, *lessThan* 

`validFrom`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *lessThan*, *lessThanOrEquals*, *greaterThan*, *greaterThanOrEquals* 

`expiresAt`: *equals*, *notEquals*, *lessThan*, *lessThanOrEquals*, *greaterThan*, *greaterThanOrEquals*

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort via id, -id, amount and -amount. Default sort is -created_at

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default: 15, Max: 100

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

product.description: Product

price.description: Money

isNotCalculatedFromExchangeTable.description: Whether is calculated from exchange table

hideInBulkPriceListing.description: Whether to hide from bulk price listing

from.description: The first item being returned in the current page

path.description: The base path for the paginated results

perPage.description: The number of items shown per page

to.description: The last item being returned in the current page
